name: CLOVi.S
description:
Releasing on May 1st !!!

Help CLOVi.S to kill the viruses that are trying to destroy the pc, shoot them, blow them up, whatever, just get rid of them!

CONTROLS

Move - W, A, S, D or Arrow Keys

Item- E

Shoot- Left Mouse Button

Pause- Escape

NOTE:

CLOVi.S still in development, part of the game will be changed till the final version.

THANKS TO PLAYING !
